title: Old typewriter font
content:
Hi,

Does anyone know what this could be? So far I figured out it's not Windlin's MONO or FF Magda.

Thank you!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120225224851im_/http:/typophile.com/files/type_5672.gif)
author: Iznik

comments.content:
[TypewriterA602](http://web.archive.org/web/20120225224851/http:/www.dafont.com/font.php?file=typewriter_a602&page=1&nb_ppp_old=50&text=TRAQUENMWG&nb_ppp=50&psize=m&classt=alpha) seems to be a grunged version of this type.

- Mike Yanega

It is very beautiful.

Can you please let me know if you ever figure out what it is.

I'm pretty sure it is the same typeface as FF Magda. Perhaps the original typewriter after which Magda was modelled.

FWIW, the clean version of FF Magda was drawn after the rough version, so the different M on both may be a (mis)interpretation by the designer.

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120225224851im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_4191.jpg)
  
Dear friends. Im Ronin, I have this kind of font, Anyone know the name of this font, please let me know. Thank u!  
Ronin

Ronin, start a new thread next time.

Anyway, the font is [Simple](http://web.archive.org/web/20120225224851/http:/www.lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/Simple/).
